Package com.dua3.utility.fx.controls

package com.dua3.utility.fx.controls
JavaFX controls and fluent builders for dialogs and panes.

The package provides - ready-to-use dialog builders such as AlertBuilder, PromptBuilder, InputDialogBuilder, and OptionsDialogBuilder; - pane builders like PromptPaneBuilder, InputDialogPaneBuilder, and InputPaneBuilder for embedding in custom dialogs or views; - utility entry points collected in Dialogs.

    This package contains classes for working with icons in JavaFX.

    This package contains classes for working with JavaFX Web views.
